purpose: Facilitates the creation, editing, and deployment of full-stack web applications entirely within the browser environment
principle: Built on WebContainers technology, allowing Node.js environments to run natively in the browser without the need for a backend server
reusability: Highly composable with support for various web technologies and frameworks, offering a seamless development experience directly in the browser
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues, and is limited to environments that support WebContainers
name: bolt.new
description: Prompt, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web applications
highlight: Enables rapid prototyping and deployment of full-stack applications directly in the browser using WebContainers
